MS MCQs

    Connecting IoT devices to Cognitive Services using Azure Functions

    »

    1. Which of the following descriptions best describes how Speech translation works?

      Speech translation recognizes speech from microphone input to convert the speech into a large number of audio files, and asynchronously receives transcription results.

      Speech translation recognizes speech from microphone input to convert speech into an audio file, normalizes the text, and then translates into an audio file.

      It recognizes speech from microphone input to convert the speech into an audio file and then synthesize speech to a speaker.


    2. How would you describe a function app?

      A function app is a function runtime to execute the function code.

      A function app is a containerized application that can be invoked using a trigger.

      A function app is a collection of one or more functions that are managed together.
